name: Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Detailed Temporary Works Drawing(s) to be issued by the Temporary Works Designer, and agreed with the Project Management Team, for the relevant portion of Temporary Works.
By - Temporary Works Coordinator or PE

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Temporary Works Design Certificate to be issued by the Temporary Works Designer, in conjunction with the Temporary Works Drawings, setting out all the considerations and requirements of the relevant Temporary Works portion.
By - Temporary Works Coordinator or PE
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Where required, a Lift Certificate will be issued by the Temporary Works Designer, setting out all the considerations and requirements for lifting.
By - Temporary Works Coordinator or PE
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Complete a comprehensive inspection based on the temporary works drawings and the required methodology.
Verifying Document - Site Records and sufficient photos to verify design requirements
Frequency - As per Temporary Works Register
By - Temporary Works Coordinator or Temporary Works Representative

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Any further evidence required, as set out in the Temporary Works Drawings, Design Certificate, or Lift Certificate, to be produced as per the relevant standard and attached here to support the Permit to Load sign-off - NDM test, Scala test, or other as specified.
Standard / Specification - Relevant industry, IANZ, AS/NZS Standards
Verifying Document - Site Record Sheet or Lab Report
Frequency - As per Temporary Works Design
By - Temporary Works Coordinator or SE

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Being the appointed inspection reviewer of the above temporary works, I hereby certify that the works as described on the Temporary Works Certificate numbered above, and the associated documentation has been satisfactorily constructed.
○ Approval is given to LOAD the temporary works as intended.
By - Suitably Competent Engineer (Temporary works designer or Temporary Works Coordinator)
2.04 - Temporary Works Permit to Load Certificate
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Permit to Load Certificate issued by Suitably Competent Engineer.
By - Temporary Works Coordinator or PE
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Complete a comprehensive inspection based on the temporary works drawings and requirements for unloading, as set out in the Design Certificate.
Verifying Document - Site Records and sufficient photos to verify design requirements
Frequency - As per Temporary Works Register
By - Temporary Works Coordinator or Temporary Works Representative

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Any further evidence required, as set out in the Temporary Works Drawings or Design Certificate, to be produced as per the relevant standard and attached here to support the Permit to Unload sign-off - Compression test, NDM test, or other as specified.
Standard / Specification - Relevant industry, IANZ, AS/NZS Standards
Verifying Document - Site Record Sheet or Lab Report
Frequency - As per Temporary Works Design
By - Temporary Works Coordinator or SE

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Being the appointed inspection reviewer of the above temporary works, I hereby certify that the permanent works as described on the Temporary Works Certificate numbered above, and the associated requirements for unloading has been satisfactorily completed.
○ Approval is given to UNLOAD the temporary works as intended.
By - Suitably Competent Engineer (Temporary works designer or Temporary Works Coordinator)
2.04 - Temporary Works Permit to Unload Certificate
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Permit to Unload Certificate issued by Suitably Competent Engineer.
By - Temporary Works Coordinator or PE
